statements: SELECT * FROM Manuscripts;
SELECT title, author FROM Manuscripts ORDER BY year_published DESC;
SELECT id, title FROM Manuscripts WHERE author = 'Jane Austen';
SELECT author, year_published FROM Manuscripts WHERE year_published > 1800;
SELECT id, title, content FROM Manuscripts ORDER BY author ASC, year_published DESC;
SELECT title, author FROM Manuscripts WHERE year_published > 2000 ORDER BY title ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Manuscripts WHERE author = 'John Doe' AND year_published BETWEEN 2000 AND 2020 ORDER BY year_published DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT author, COUNT(*) as manuscript_count FROM Manuscripts GROUP BY author HAVING manuscript_count > 1 ORDER BY manuscript_count DESC
SELECT id, title, year_published FROM Manuscripts WHERE content LIKE '%research%' ORDER BY year_published ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT author, AVG(year_published) as avg_year_published FROM Manuscripts GROUP BY author ORDER BY avg_year_published DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM manuscripts WHERE id = 1
SELECT title, author, year_published FROM manuscripts WHERE genre = 'Fiction'
SELECT author, title, genre FROM literary_works WHERE year_published > 2000
SELECT id, title, author FROM manuscripts WHERE author LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM literary_works ORDER BY year_published DESC
SELECT * FROM manuscripts WHERE year_published > 2000 ORDER BY title DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT author, title, year_published FROM manuscripts WHERE genre = 'Fiction' ORDER BY year_published ASC;
SELECT id, author, YEAR(NOW()) - year_published AS year_difference FROM literary_works WHERE genre = 'Non-Fiction';
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS manuscripts_count FROM manuscripts GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY manuscripts_count DESC;
SELECT CONCAT(author, ' - ', genre) AS author_genre, content FROM literary_works WHERE LENGTH(content) > 1000 ORDER BY author_genre ASC, content DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Manuscripts;
SELECT title, author FROM LiteraryWorks WHERE genre='Fiction';
SELECT id, name, curator FROM Archives ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT author, title, published_date, content FROM Manuscripts WHERE author LIKE 'J%';
SELECT id, location, capacity FROM Archives WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY capacity ASC;
SELECT * FROM Manuscripts WHERE author = 'John Doe' ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT title, author, genre FROM LiteraryWorks WHERE genre = 'Science Fiction' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM Archives ORDER BY name DESC, location ASC;
SELECT * FROM Manuscripts WHERE title LIKE '%the%' AND author = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT author, title, published_date FROM LiteraryWorks WHERE author = 'James Brown' AND published_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM manuscripts;
SELECT title, author FROM literary_works WHERE genre='Fiction';
SELECT author, year_published FROM manuscripts ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT * FROM manuscripts WHERE year_published > 2000 ORDER BY year_published DESC;
SELECT title, city, country FROM literary_works JOIN locations ON literary_works.id = locations.id;
SELECT * FROM manuscripts WHERE author = 'Jane Austen';
SELECT title, author FROM literary_works WHERE genre = 'Romance' ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT title, year_published FROM manuscripts WHERE year_published > 1800 ORDER BY year_published DESC;
SELECT * FROM manuscripts m JOIN archive a ON m.id = a.manuscript_id JOIN literary_works l ON a.literary_work_id = l.id;
SELECT author, COUNT(*) as total_works FROM literary_works GROUP BY author HAVING total_works > 1 ORDER BY total_works DESC;
SELECT * FROM Manuscripts;
SELECT title, author FROM LiteraryWorks WHERE genre = 'Fantasy';
SELECT name, birth_year FROM Authors ORDER BY birth_year DESC;
SELECT description FROM Collections WHERE id = 3;
SELECT title FROM Manuscripts JOIN ManuscriptAuthors ON Manuscripts.id = ManuscriptAuthors.manuscript_id WHERE author_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Manuscripts;
SELECT title, author FROM LiteraryWorks WHERE year_published > 2000;
SELECT title, genre FROM LiteraryWorks WHERE author = 'Jane Austen';
SELECT * FROM Authors WHERE birth_year BETWEEN 1800 AND 1850 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT m.title, a.name FROM Manuscripts m JOIN ManuscriptAuthors ma ON m.id = ma.manuscript_id JOIN Authors a ON a.id = ma.author_id;
